name: Essity Aktiebolag (publ)
goal:
Essity is a leading global hygiene and health company, dedicated to improving well-being through leading hygiene and health solutions.
We develop, produce and sell products and solutions in Personal Care, Consumer Tissue and Professional Hygiene. Around 500 million people use our products every day. Our brands include TENA, Tork, Leukoplast, Libero, Libresse, Lotus, Nosotras, Saba, Tempo, Vinda and Zewa, and we work all over the world in around 150 countries. Essity used to be part of the SCA Group.
Essity's headquarters are in Stockholm, Sweden and are the company listed on Nasdaq, Stockholm.
The company has about 48,000 employees. Net sales in 2018 amounted to approximately EUR 11.565 bn. Essity has its headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden, and is listed on NASDAQ OMX Stockholm.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Circular economy package
Energy union including EU ETS
Climate change
Chemicals / REACH Review
Healthcare policies
Consumer policies
Medical technology
Transportation
